SPENDING TRACKER Settings Easily keep track of your expenses Start by pressing the SetUp button below SetUp Add Expense Tracking User Profile
//START SCREEN
You can still change your income and categories in Setup! You need to set up your income and categories in Setup before adding any expenses!
//SETUP SCREEN Setup
Rent/Mortgage Food/Grocery Entertainment Loans Savings Credit Card Fuel Manual Category
Select the categories you want to track:
Submit
Your income is currently: $ Categories added/removed successfully! Press back to add and track expenses.
Please enter an income! Please enter a decimal number without special characters.
You currently have no active categories. Your active categories:
Enter your Monthly Income in decimal format without \'$\' or other special characters.
//ADD EXPENSE SCREEN Add Expense Select a category Enter the amount in decimal format without \'$\' or other special characters. Submit
Please enter an amount! Enter a decimal number without special characters. You have exceeded your income of $
Please select a category to add to. Amount added to Rent/Mortgage: $ Amount added to Food/Grocery: $ Amount added to Entertainment: $ Amount added to Loans: $ Amount added to Savings: $ Amount added to Credit: $ Amount added to Fuel: $ Amount added to $
Add another expense or press back and press Tracking to view the tracking charts.
BLANK RENT FOOD ENTERTAIN LOANS SAVINGS CREDIT FUEL MANUAL
//TRACKING SCREEN Tracking Pie Chart View Expense Vs. Income View List View
Press a button above to view its chart.
You have currently spent \'\'% of your income of $
Rent/Mortgage = Food/Grocery = Entertainment = Loans = Savings = Credit Card = Fuel = Manual Category =
